nodes.text: Senate Hill was a location on Coruscant that was adjacent to Monument Plaza. Lines of tourists waiting to touch the peak of Umate regularly stretched all the way through the park to Senate Hill.

Senate Hill was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Light of the Jedi, written by Charles Soule. It first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 1996 novel X-Wing: Rogue Squadron, written by Michael A. Stackpole.
